name: CommodityAI
headline: AI & Automation Software Powering Physical Commodity Trading
description:
We build software that supports the movement of millions of tons of raw commodities like sugar, cocoa, and coffee around the world. Our trading and operations management platform serves as a system of record, powered by AI automation that eliminates the friction points in operating a physical trading and distribution business.

Our team consists of an experienced commodity trader with 8 years of experience and two skilled engineers with a combined 13 years of experience from Samsara and Autodesk.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:supply-chain; industry:enterprise-software; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

# Simplify your physical commodity management
Manage your commodity business with AI and automation to increase speed, efficiency, and flexibility
[Get Started![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65f0f2daf1154a9c3bf60489_arrow.svg)](https://commodityai.io/<#>)
![Badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65ef9600d9a19064eb19ce94_badge.webp)
Use Cases
## **How companies leverage CommodityAI to supercharge their****commodity operations**
[ Shipment Management Automation](https://commodityai.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Intelligent Document Processing](https://commodityai.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Stakeholder Collaboration](https://commodityai.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
### Take control of your commodity trading operations with our Shipment Management Automation solution.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa96900cdcc0f38520cdd_bullet.webp)
End-to-End Shipment Management:
Automate your entire shipment from placement to fulfillment, with features like auto-generated shipping nominations and freight booking requests.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9bb65521ee12f4b9b02_bullet%20\(1\).webp)
Advanced Shipment Tracking:
Stay updated with real-time tracking of shipments, including automatic status updates and estimated time of arrival.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9cb0c95b80357cdc42d_bullet%20\(2\).webp)
AI-Driven Performance Analytics:
Utilize AI-generated dashboards and performance reports to pinpoint areas for improvement and drive continuous optimization within your shipment management operations.
![A screenshot of a cell phone with a map of different countries.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efaa874738f82824d370c0_img.webp)
### Transform your document management from a manual process to a automated system.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa96900cdcc0f38520cdd_bullet.webp)
Smart Data Extraction and Validation:
Utilize our AI-powered OCR technology to extract key data from documents like invoices and contracts, and validate it automatically against predefined rules or databases.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9bb65521ee12f4b9b02_bullet%20\(1\).webp)
Accurate Document Classification:
Automatically categorize documents based on content or metadata, making retrieval and organization a breeze.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9cb0c95b80357cdc42d_bullet%20\(2\).webp)
Digital Document Capture:
Effortlessly scan, capture, and digitize physical documents such as Bills of Lading and Purchase Orders for easy processing and storage.
![A screenshot of a cell phone next to a document.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efab3ddf6a2e0ba5eab3be_img%20\(1\).webp)
### Enhance efficiency and decision-making through streamlined communication and collaboration
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa96900cdcc0f38520cdd_bullet.webp)
Instant Messaging & Notifications:
Enable real-time communication between stakeholders (traders, logistics teams, suppliers, etc.) to quickly address issues, make decisions, and share updates.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9bb65521ee12f4b9b02_bullet%20\(1\).webp)
Secure Document Sharing:
Facilitate easy sharing, storage, and retrieval of important documents, ensuring all parties have access to the information they need.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9cb0c95b80357cdc42d_bullet%20\(2\).webp)
Electronic Signature and Approval:
Streamline approvals with digital signing capabilities, reducing the need for physical signatures and accelerating decision-making.
![A group of people on a cell phone.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efabb44f1e90643e3a37b5_img%20\(2\).webp)
Supply-Chain Automation
### Take control of your commodity trading operations with our Supply-Chain Automation solution.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa96900cdcc0f38520cdd_bullet.webp)
End-to-End Supply-Chain Management:
Automate your entire shipment from placement to fulfillment, with features like auto-generated shipping nominations and freight booking requests.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9bb65521ee12f4b9b02_bullet%20\(1\).webp)
Advanced Shipment Tracking:
Stay updated with real-time tracking of shipments, including automatic status updates and estimated time of arrival.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9cb0c95b80357cdc42d_bullet%20\(2\).webp)
AI-Driven Performance Analytics:
Identify areas for improvement, and drive continuous optimization in your supply-chain operations, with AI-generated dashboard and performance reports.
![A screenshot of a cell phone with a map of different countries.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efaa874738f82824d370c0_img.webp)
Intelligent Document Processing
### Transform your document management from a manual process to a automated system.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa96900cdcc0f38520cdd_bullet.webp)
Smart Data Extraction and Validation:
Utilize our AI-powered OCR technology to extract key data from documents like invoices and contracts, and validate it automatically against predefined rules or databases.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9bb65521ee12f4b9b02_bullet%20\(1\).webp)
Accurate Document Classification:
Automatically categorize documents based on content or metadata, making retrieval and organization a breeze.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9cb0c95b80357cdc42d_bullet%20\(2\).webp)
Digital Document Capture:
Effortlessly scan, capture, and digitize physical documents such as Bills of Lading and Purchase Orders for easy processing and storage.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efab1f59df2c99540816dc_bullet%20\(3\).webp)
Electronic Signature and Approval:
Streamline approvals with digital signing capabilities, reducing the need for physical signatures and accelerating decision-making.
![A screenshot of a cell phone next to a document.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efab3ddf6a2e0ba5eab3be_img%20\(1\).webp)
Stakeholder Collaboration
### Enhance efficiency and decision-making through streamlined communication and collaboration
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa96900cdcc0f38520cdd_bullet.webp)
Joint Planning and Forecasting:
Collaborate with counterparties and customers on planning and forecasting to align demand and supply expectations.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9bb65521ee12f4b9b02_bullet%20\(1\).webp)
Instant Messaging & Notifications:
Enable real-time communication between stakeholders (traders, logistics teams, suppliers, etc.) to quickly address issues, make decisions, and share updates.
![Bullet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efa9cb0c95b80357cdc42d_bullet%20\(2\).webp)
Secure Document Sharing and Management:
Facilitate easy sharing, storage, and retrieval of important documents, ensuring all parties have access to the information they need.
![A group of people on a cell phone.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efabb44f1e90643e3a37b5_img%20\(2\).webp)
![Lines](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efac1da39c7b2ca4e98297_lines%20\(2\).webp)

Capabilities
## Built for the Commodities Industry
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efc4d7453a6a43fca05f09_Frame%201281.webp)
Commodity-Specific Automations
Access automations tailored to address the unique workflows in commodity trading operations.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efc602f727d6b871fddb20_Frame%2047347.webp)
ERP Integration
Allows for easy connectivity with your internal systems, expanding functionality and data integration capabilities at the click of a button.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efc6034fd4fe6184d17d66_Frame%2047347-1.webp)
AI Co-pilot
Leverage our AI Copilot to generate insights from customizable charts and reports, helping you take better and faster decisions.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efc60251bd57ca76121fe2_Frame%2047347-2.webp)
Document Management and Data Extraction
Streamline document handling and automate data extraction to reduce manual effort and improve data accuracy.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efc602df6a2e0ba5f85ade_Frame%2047347-3.webp)
Notifications and Alerts
Stay informed of critical supply chain events and market changes to enable proactive management and response.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65ef7e0826a3ff81cc285b2a/65efc602d9a19064eb32ea42_Frame%2047347-4.webp)
Collaboration and Communication
Facilitate effective teamwork and information sharing for coordinated action and decision-making.
Integrations

generated_description:
**CommodityAI: Powering Efficiency in Commodity Trading**

Founded in 2024 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s W24 batch, CommodityAI is based in San Francisco and aims to revolutionize the physical commodity trading landscape through AI and automation. The company provides a robust platform that supports the logistics of millions of tons of commodities like sugar, cocoa, and coffee. Their mission is straightforward: to eliminate the friction in trading and distribution processes, thereby turning cumbersome operations into seamless workflows.

**Meet the Team**

The team behind CommodityAI is small but mighty, consisting of three individuals: an experienced commodity trader with eight years in the field and two engineers with a combined 13 years of expertise from reputable companies such as Samsara and Autodesk. Their diverse backgrounds bring a wealth of knowledge to the platform, which integrates cutting-edge technology with deep industry insights.

**Key Features and Solutions**

CommodityAI focuses on a few pivotal areas to enhance trading operations:

1. **Shipment Management Automation**: This feature automates the entire shipment process, from initiation to fulfillment, with real-time tracking and AI-driven performance analytics to continually optimize operations.

2. **Intelligent Document Processing**: Goodbye to manual document handling! The platform uses AI-powered technology to extract and validate data from documents like invoices and contracts, significantly speeding up the process.

3. **Stakeholder Collaboration Tools**: Real-time communication channels ensure that all parties involved—from traders to logistics teams—can align quickly and effectively.

4. **Supply Chain Automation**: A comprehensive solution for managing supply chains that allows users to stay updated on shipment statuses and make informed decisions on the fly.

**Benefits: Aiming for Excellence**

By leveraging AI and automation, CommodityAI helps its users drastically reduce operating costs—potentially by up to 35%—while enhancing productivity by allowing traders to focus on strategic decisions instead of administrative tasks. Users can expect to reduce time spent on paperwork by about 40%. The platform also provides insights into revenue growth opportunities through its AI-driven analytics.

**Why Choose CommodityAI?**

The blend of AI-led insights, document management, and automation geared specifically toward the commodity trading sector positions CommodityAI as a game-changer. Whether you’re looking to streamline your operations, improve data accuracy, or enhance stakeholder collaboration, this platform has the tools you need to thrive in a competitive landscape.

In summary, if physical commodity trading feels bogged down by inefficiencies, CommodityAI stands ready to usher in a new era of efficiency and profitability. Get started on your transformation journey through their [website](https://commodityai.io/).
